website_summaries.verdict: A bench that's as practical as it is stylish.
pros: Vinyl frame gives it an edge in longevity over wood counterparts
Can easily double as a patio buffet table
cons: Assembly can be complex due to insufficient instructions

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Finished Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a serving area on my patio, and it will definitely fill the bill. With all the parts it takes to put this together, I gave myself two days to do the job, and I'm glad I didn't press myself. The directions are pretty clear, but you have to be careful and dedicated. I'm 77; did it all myself! YOU can do it, too. As others have said, keep everything squared to keep the slats all going straight when you're finished.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: Nice but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I like this little bench. It's the perfect size for what I wanted. But it was missing parts and I could not have done it by myself. It's not hard to put together but it's complicated by having to put all the slates and sides together with our having help. I was missing 2 slates and one brace. We put it together with what we had because it took me awhile to find someone to help me. So before putting it together check for all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: QB7

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Once the initial panic attack over the amount of parts and labeling of said parts was past, it was fairly simple to put together. Even though I ordered White, the sent Mocha which turned out better as it matches the siding on the porch better. It’s beautiful put together and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: G.W.

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to scream during assembly
customer_reviews.text: I am an extremely handy person. Have assembled hundreds of items in my day. Even IKEA furniture. This by far was the most frustrating item I ever had to assemble. DO NOT BUY IT!!!! It’s easier to go purchase something else. The instructions were a joke and the assembly design was an even bigger joke. If you ignore this warning you will wish you didn’t halfway through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I received this and put it together by myself (71 yr old male). It is better if two people do it together as some of the parts are difficult to get together. Once assembled it is reasonable stable and does what it is made for.
customer_reviews.author: collegebob

customer_reviews.title: Have help to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars, but the difficulty in assembly took it down a star. My husband (who can put motors in cars and add additions to a house), stated that he could not understand how this product could be marketed to the public because of the difficult assembly. Together, we got it done in @2 hours. It does look great, however! Very easy to clean after using.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R. Helm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Put this together in about 45 minutes with just myself and a very (un)helpful 4 year old. Directions are a little confusing at first because none of the parts are labeled. I just took everything out of the box and figured it out by following the pictures. It came out beautiful! Can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully the price is borne out in usage ...
customer_reviews.text: Ready for an afternoon of aggravation? Then order this and get ready to wish the designer of this was some kind of an engineer. My neighbors after hearing me hollering while trying to assemble, who are both MENSA Members, came over to help. Well, 4 hands are better than 2, but what an unfortunate experience and their brain power didn't help much. My last Bench Purchase was probably 15 years ago, was Wood and took me 90 minutes to assemble. It also required painting. But was significantly STURDIER than this example. Not a snowballs chance in Hades that I'd recommend this to a friend, or anyone for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: L'wood

customer_reviews.title: Quick assembly, fast clean up
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a wood potting bench I bought a few years ago. The old potting bench was never as sturdy as this one and it required much more maintenance to prevent the wood from rotting. Not only is this bench quite nice looking, it is incredibly sturdy and I love how quick & easy it was to assemble using an electric drill. I especially like the easy clean up - just hose it off and you're done! I like the height, too - much easier on old backs!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice potting bench and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this potting bench! I originally wanted one made out of wood. But I was hesitant on a wood potting bench since the bench would be getting exposed to water and lots of sun!! Glad I bought the dura trel bench!! It’s very sturdy, aesthetically looks nice and most important it’s easy to clean and the materials won’t warp on you!! I am so happy I found this bench on amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Post

customer_reviews.title: ... just finished putting this together and I couldn't be happier. The picture just doesn't do it justice
customer_reviews.text: I just finished putting this together and I couldn't be happier. The picture just doesn't do it justice. Extremely well made and durable. The directions were good, however you need to pay close attention to the locations of the cut outs. They are not in the middle so you need to be sure to match front and back in the same position. Took me about 2 hours to assemble. Beautiful Potting Bench! Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY C.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Piece seems to be durable. It is attractive. Given that it is made of PVC type material, hopefully it will last longer than the wooden bench it replaced. Assembly was NOT difficult. Just lay the pieces out first by sections to minimize the confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lightweight & versatile
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an outdoor shelving unit to use on our deck. This potting table fits the bill and was exactly what I was looking for (even though it will not be used for potting plants!). Perfect weatherproof piece to use as a serving station. It took about 2 hours to put together. It is lightweight enough to make it easy to move around the deck if needed. Easy to clean. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: Agree with one of the other reviewers. It needs some type of additional stabilization. The additional lattice idea is a great one plus it adds to the look of the bench. Great bench with a great warranty. You will more than get your money's worth out of it. It took my husband less than an hour to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: We finally got this put together, but have some pieces left over. It works without them but ... It would be a great help if the pieces were numbered and if the photo of the finished bench showed more detail (and was bigger and in sharp focus). Ditto the directions. Those pieces left over are small and the drawing of the directions are small. The best advantage for this is that it is light weight, so it will be easier to move than the wooden benches I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Esther E. Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The potting bench is very sturdy. I was looking for a durable bench that would not begin to rot after its second season. I believe I found it in the Dura-Trel bench. Not a five star rating, because the bench is a bit difficult to put together. I was working by myself and it took four hours. Some of the pieces are hard to differentiate from each other. One must have a power drill to complete the construction. Now that the bench is together, I have used it and really like it. Washes off with a hose, and no worries about weather worthiness.
customer_reviews.author: Gagal

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Decent product for the price. The slat installation was a bit frustrating so don't assemble this if you are in an impatient mood. I was short 12 x 3/4" screws & guide holes were missing on two pieces. However, it only took me 30 minutes to put together by myself & it wouldn't have taken that long if I wasn't so slow in reading instructions. BTW, use a drill for the screws.
customer_reviews.author: anotherVulcan

customer_reviews.title: Great item and by no means light weight
customer_reviews.text: Use this next to the grill. Came missing a piece or two, called the seller and had the parts within a day or two. Great piece, sturdy and sufficiently heavy so it won't blow away in normal breezes. Mine is in a protected area, so maybe a 40-60 mph wind would do it??? :)
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: This was very difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: And while the instructions labeled by number the 1,000 pieces it came with, the pieces themselves were not numbered. I needed to use a measuring tape to make sure I was putting together the right pieces. Also, you will need to have an electric phillips head screwdriver unless you have extremely strong hands. Finally, I did not appreciate being billed $35 automatically for an insurance program for this bench. I am trying to have this charge remove.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana customer

customer_reviews.title: Challenging assembly, but love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was difficult to get all the pieces for the bottom section lined up and put together, but now that it is assembled, it is perfect for our needs. We were provided with too many of one type of screw, and not enough of another, but we had some extras at the house that seem to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Potting Bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice addition to my patio. The bench is sturdy, wasn't too difficult to assemble 2 people an hour or so being very careful to read all of the directions. It's very strong and the bright white looks so nice. I'd recommend this to anyone that wants to get away from wood.
customer_reviews.author: newfilter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backyard
customer_reviews.text: A little confusing on directions but if you lay out the parts and match them to the directions, not that hard. One caution would be to not drill the screws until your sure you have assembled the bench correctly, can't move the pvc and put the screw in and then move it slightly and screw it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Would definitely recommend it for a bench ...
customer_reviews.text: Unlike what I read on other reviews, I had few problems assembling the bench. All the parts were in the box. I assembled it by myself. Granted, I used a ratchet strap to hold the front and back sections together and also to square them up. Bought this for my wife. I like it. Would definitely recommend it for a bench to leave outside. Looks great with our vinyl fence.
customer_reviews.author: David Burnham

customer_reviews.title: nice work space
customer_reviews.text: I have this next to my outdoor utility tub/sink for washing and prepping my homegrown produce before it comes into the house. Helps keep the bugs/dirt out of my kitchen and outside where they belong. Should be real nice at canning time too. Also use for potting and transplanting bedding plants. A snap to clean, just hose it off! A comfortable height to work on. No rotting wood or peeling paint to worry about. L brackets recommended for the top shelf, since it cannot handle any weight without them. Other than that it is quite sturdy. A nice addition to any deck, greenhouse or porch
customer_reviews.author: EMS Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Not just for the garden!
customer_reviews.text: Love it- bought it for a “free bread” table at our senior center- put white baskets on the shelves to hold the variety of bread and treats. Seniors loved it and it was a perfect fit- sturdy but light!
customer_reviews.author: CMV

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gardening Bench
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it for gardening. Daughter and I assembled it in an hour. Putting the bottom shelf slats in so the others didn't fall out took some thought but we got it. Nice bench.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Have the correct tools
customer_reviews.text: I am a 68yo female. I put this together by myself in a little over 2 hrs. First, read the directions - I had all the parts but some look very similar. Take your time. It helps to have a decent tape measure, big file, decent drill and screw bit, and some wipes for the glue that will inevitably get on your fingers. No harder than any other do-it-yourself furniture, helps that's it's lightweight. Have other products from this company that are 15 years old and still look good. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Lenhert

customer_reviews.title: The table is sturdy and the perfect height.
customer_reviews.text: The table is exactly as pictured. There are a lot more screws than I expected and I believe most would need help to get the job done. I am pleased with the table and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Retired in California

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a total piece of junk. I got have way through assembling it and then just quit because it wasn't even worth my time! I'd return it but I'm not sure it's even worth my time in packing it all back up. Terrible instructions, terrible quality, and just junk. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: bmees

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars, but boy oh boy it's not an easy project to put this together! Excellent quality, and shipped in a timely manner. I'm actually using it indoors as a media desk. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice looking and stable. A little tricky putting in bottom slats. Two people a must to put together. As is electric drill with phillips screw driver bit. Well worth saving $150.00 you would be charged if delivered assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Lynele

customer_reviews.title: Weatherproof Potting Bench for all year outdoors...5-Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Same dimensions as our old, rotted-out, wooden potting table. This new modern one is sturdy enough, weather & termite proof. The bright white polyester material rinses off cleane, better than any new paint job.
customer_reviews.author: Bill and Jane

customer_reviews.title: Read description and reviews thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: The box was ripped and re-taped a few of the pieces were cracked. Not easy to assemble I would suggest laying out all the pieces in groups of like pieces because none of them are labeled, as said earlier. Read the description thoroughly and don’t be misled by the word Dura in the name of the product. It is PVC not Durawood.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Lavalla

customer_reviews.title: Potting bench dual purpose.
customer_reviews.text: This potting bench was very easy to assemble by two women, all the parts and the holes matched up perfectly. Its very strong. I would highly recommend this for potting plants or a Out door bar for a patio, it is a lovely addition to my outdoor patio.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice potting bench
customer_reviews.text: Great potting bench, sturdy, heavy enough and stays clean. Wipe clean, doesn't get the algae like wood. My husband put it together, but did not mention how difficult it was, so I'm assuming it wasn't that hard.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martini

customer_reviews.title: Great item that can be used as furniture inside or out
customer_reviews.text: Very easily put together...completely vinyl except for screws. I bought two for prep tables for food, drinks for my front deck which is 50 ft long and 18 feet wide. Looks very nice, don't have to worry about weather on them and very easily cleaned. Best buy in months as far as I'm concerned and my wife LOVES them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Brunson Akins

customer_reviews.title: My grandma loved it. Assembly wasn't too bad
customer_reviews.text: My grandma loved it. Assembly wasn't too bad, I assembled it by myself and had it together within an hour or so. Hopefully this garden bench will last longer than her old metal one that the legs rusted off of.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Putting bench together is time consuming but once together it is great for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of this product it was a little difficult to put put the slating together at base. We did have a major glitch, the holes in the front posts were cut too low so we had to use miter saw to cut back posts down to match front then bench went together smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Building this bench is a nightmare!!
customer_reviews.text: [[ASIN:B0036CY9DI Dura-Trel 11203 Greenfield Potting Bench, White I would not recommend this product. it was very difficult to put together. The directions weren't clear at all and we had had to line the pieces up and drill the holes ourselves. The finished product,after 2 days of working on it, is slanted forward. The top shelf pushes right out even with the brackets. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: I love this potting bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this potting bench, it's sturdy and perfect for my screened in porch. I am using it more as a console table with plants and outdoor decrotives. Pay attention to others and use a square!
customer_reviews.author: SLA

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice sturdy bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sturdy bench for the price. Great customer service. I use this for all my herbs and have it on the deck. Holds a lot of pots and very sturdy. I can place them on the bottom shelf when a heavy rain falls. Plenty of shelf space on the bottom for extra pots and supplies. The item arrived with the shipping box damaged by UPS and a couple of small pieces were missing. Rather than sending it back, Dura Trel fedex'd the pieces and I had them 2 days later, no questions asked. Great company to deal with. Dura-Trel is great Amercian company an understands what customer service really is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to put together but very nice. We live in Hawaii where everything rusts away or falls apart in a short time. This will survive for several years and still look new. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to backyard
customer_reviews.text: This is holding up very well. Looks great and I use it to put potted plants on. Easy to put together. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Davis

customer_reviews.title: I really like this potting table
customer_reviews.text: I really like this potting table. If it wasn’t such a royal pain in the butt to assemble I would love it. The screw holes didn’t line up for the screws. I had to use my electric drill in order to get the screws to go in. The slats were a nightmare to try to hold in place even with two of us working on it. Now that it’s done I enjoy using it and like that it’s so easy to clean off with the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The bench came out looking , but it was hard to put together. For the amount of time and frustration, I should have brought one that was preassembled.
customer_reviews.author: Austin 360

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great value
customer_reviews.text: We looked at quite a few wood potting benches, but this one caught our eye. It seemed like a lot of parts when we opened the box, but the directions were very clear and it went together in less than 30 minutes. Great product, would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a pain to put together but it was totally worth it. It is sturdy and cleaner looking than wood. Love it
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome potting bench
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my small greenhouse. Easy to clean. Very cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron

customer_reviews.title: Maintenance free, strong, weatherproof resin (vinyl) Potting Bench
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, strong, stable, maintenance free and well designed gardening potting bench. Only difficulty I encountered was inserting the slats that became the bottom shelf. I do wish it was engineered so that this could be accomplished more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dog and cat lover

customer_reviews.title: Using as a drink station
customer_reviews.text: We just re-did our deck & I got this potting table as a drink station. the vinyl is very easy to clean & great in all types of weather. Putting it together was a bit tricky- needed 2 people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in great shape and packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape and packaged well. Went together fairly easily; definitely more doable with two people. It is very sturdy and is a great height to work at - particularly for someone at 5'10". Should have purchased this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Betty A. Poole

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were easy to follow. The legs had predrilled holes, but I had to predrill the rest as the screws would not go through the dense plastic. Looks great. I like the height of it. I expect it to last much longer than one made of wood.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl Potting Bench is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The Dura-Trel potting bench arrived exactly when promised, and I put it together immediately. Instructions are easy to follow, but identifying all of the parts is a bit time consuming. Once everything is sorted, the bench goes together quickly. I like the design of the table which permits easy removal for cleaning. The height is perfect for my wife, who is short and feared that she would not be able to reach the top shelf. Overall, a nice addition to our patio.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby assembled this in a couple of hours. He said it wasn’t too difficult. Looks great, no maintenance and I will use this on the screened porch to set up for family bbq.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Marcase

customer_reviews.title: Good bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is exactly what I was looking for. I have no idea about ease of assembly because I didn’t assist but it did not take long. I like the idea that it has a 20 year warranty and is maintenance free.
customer_reviews.author: Ettablue

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Assemble & Clean
customer_reviews.text: Needed an easy to clean potting bench for my greenhouse. I assembled it myself. It was very easy. Love the fact you can remove the table top to hose off. It’s quite sturdy and the lower shelf holds a lot of pots, saucers and various other garden items. Beats any wooden bench I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product for gardeners
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp product that serves its purpose to a “T”. It is somewhat challenging to assemble, but the finished product is eye-catching. I’m pleased
customer_reviews.author: K. Graff

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it...now she can do her potting, and not break her back. No assembly instructions...but its not too tough to figure out. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: TreatArch

customer_reviews.title: A good bench.
customer_reviews.text: I like this potting bench, it is the right height for me 6'1". I bought it in January and have used it the past couple of weeks potting Daylilies. It was fairly easy to put together, with a little help from a neighbor. The smooth finish makes it easy to clean, just hose it off when your done. I have no issues with this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiden

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part, bad design
customer_reviews.text: An entire piece was missing from the split and taped carton but we were too far along to repack it and send it back. Pieces didn't fit together well so we had to make adjustments. Poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Cynwrite

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on this bench, I purchased this and was not disappointed. I plan on using this as a buffet. It will be perfect and much less expensive than an actual buffet. It was so easy to assemble with no missing parts and came from a manufacturer right here in my own backyard! If you purchase you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: A lot of pieces. It takes 2 people to put it together. Not easy assembly. It’s ok but could have been stronger.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Great potting bench
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're REALLY careful to make sure all the corners line up exactly at a 90 degree angle, it will not be steady. Which is fine, because it's easy enough to fix. Easy to clean, great height and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: clemmie

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. I just put up a vinyl fence and this complements it well. I only took me about 30 minutes to put together and it wasn't hard at all. It's light and could easily be moved around.
customer_reviews.author: MARANDA L CLEMENT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product. works well for me as a potting table and then as a serving counter.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Product is as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for repotting or any outside needs. The second shelf is of great value to store pots and still can use the top for repotting, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not that sturdy but it is ok but not for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Sturdy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: It really looks nice. Even I made it look like it was professionally built
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H. Ebeling

customer_reviews.title: It's an awesome potting bench
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome potting bench. sturdy and weather-resistant. I'm going to add hooks on the sides to hang my spades and other potting accessories. But I really like it; it's attractive in my yard; I have already received compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate discussion brown not white
customer_reviews.text: Item cam quick but when it arrived the box was damaged and so were some parts. Not only was the product damaged but it is not white, it is a light brown. Not even an option on the website. Now I have to wait a month for them to send a replacement. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea; but once together it sits crooked. Also, pieces are not labeled so it took quite a while to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Great Work Area
customer_reviews.text: It’s absolutely fabulous. It cleans easily, holds plenty and is a perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Torbin

customer_reviews.title: Great potting bench
customer_reviews.text: Great looking potting bench. Husband put it together quickly. Lots of storage space underneath. Fast shipping Easy clean up either hose off or wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: mbs

customer_reviews.title: This potting bench is perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: This potting bench is perfect for us!!! It can be used for so many different chores, etc. it took my husband and I An hour and fifteen minutes to put it together. We were amazed with the ease of assembling. Very sturdy. We ensured we had 90 degree corners as we went along. Very sturdy !!
customer_reviews.author: M. Prise

customer_reviews.title: A second person is strongly recommend for assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Unpacking is quite a chore. Quality item though. Assembly somewhat involved. I assembled it myself but a second person would definitely be helpful. Seems well made once all assembled. Would not hesitate to recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Hermenau

customer_reviews.title: the wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together the wife loves it when shes happy so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Estes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKING POTTING BENCH
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench! It took me awhile to get it together, but I am not fast at figuring out pictures on which way each piece goes. I do wish the instructions were more informative about which side of each piece is front and which is back. However, when it was all together I was more than pleased! It won't rot or ever need painting and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: sammyj

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I wanted at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this potting bench mainly as a buffet for my outdoor eating area by the pool. It works great for that but in the spring when I plant my flower pots, I will be using it for that. I think I will cover the top with a piece of canvas so that I don't mess up the shiny surface that I serve on.
customer_reviews.author: Judie Annie

customer_reviews.title: Sold on the Dura-Trel promises about durability
customer_reviews.text: I chose this for the brand and the longevity. It's outside and I imagine it will last for many years. Had a handyman assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect garden bench. lools like it's going to hold up well. will leave it outside year 'round to test it
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kennerly

customer_reviews.title: Great Table for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The table was purchased as a display table for my husbands bonsai so that I could get our outdoor dining table back and I couldn’t be happier with how easy and quick it came together. It’s a beautiful additional to our back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have an assembly helper
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, very sturdy and looks beautiful. It took my wife and i less than an hour to assemble it, but without her extra pair of hands, it would have been a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect in my backyard to hold potting materials and plants. Easy to clean by spraying with water.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this , plastic so u can wash it off
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Potting table
customer_reviews.text: Great product, super price. It comes in a large box dismantled in pieces and some people might find this cumbersome. I had no problem putting it together and the best part it is weather proof.
customer_reviews.author: Honukane

customer_reviews.title: A Million Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to assemble. Even the professional assembler I found in our area agreed. Too narrow for use, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Bill and Sandra Finley

customer_reviews.title: Great once you're done!
customer_reviews.text: My darling husband put this together for me and had to assemble the top three times even though he carefully followed the directions. He had to drill some of the holes himself (other parts, not through his trial and error assembly of the top), so be prepared with a drill. The top shelf is more shallow than you might think, so a 6" pot clings precariously to the edge, but it is otherwise very functional. I like that the whole tabletop insert comes out for easy cleaning. It is a great height and sits nice and square on our patio (no wobbling). It would get 5 stars if it weren't so difficult to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanneboscobel

customer_reviews.title: Not so difficult to put together at all!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to order this item because of the reviews that said it took anywhere from 2 to 4 hours to put together. I was able to do it in just a little over an hour so I'm not sure why people were having such issues! I absolutely LOVE this potting bench, it's perfect for my potting needs and excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: WhatTheHeck

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This bench is a perfect height and looks great in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: After throwing two wooden ones to the trash, this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sally Downs

customer_reviews.title: Top plastic looking
customer_reviews.text: It's nicely built and made of white vinyl but too white and plastic looking. I kept it but I rill sell it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kurilla

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Holes for screws were not punched out, instructions were awful!
customer_reviews.author: Lindy7

customer_reviews.title: Potting Table
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to put together must have two people. Once table was completed I was happy with its' look and stability.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Mommie

customer_reviews.title: I love my gardening table
customer_reviews.text: I love my gardening table. Is very functionable. I can do my planting and repotting on it. I like that is plastic vinyl. Easy to care.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Beauty & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Sure looks great in the yard...Being in Oklahoma City, OK, I had to add a couple bricks to give it the weight to put up with the Oklahoma Wind. We sure like it.
customer_reviews.author: OneDayC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It took about 1 1/2 hours to put together with a battery operated screwdriver and I'm 68 years old and not mechanically inclined. It is sturdy, attractive and easy to wash down with a garden hose. The table is at just the right height. This is a good choice to sit outside in Florida weather.
customer_reviews.author: Caboodle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's got a great deal of pieces to build but its still nice
customer_reviews.author: Lee R. Lescano

customer_reviews.title: Great product, all parts included
customer_reviews.text: It takes two people about 2 hours to assemble, but it's sturdy and will hold up forever. It's on my patio for planting.
customer_reviews.author: stringlady

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Using this product for an outdoor bar cart!! Extremely durable and hold up to the elements!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: rachael white

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a great value, looks great and is good quality..... just a little cumbersome to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

product_meta.title: Dura-Trel 11203 Greenfield Potting Bench, White
product_meta.description: Made in USA. Any gardener will appreciate the simplicity of the Greenfield Potting Bench. With a large, sturdy lower shelf perfect for keeping large bags and tools and an easy to reach top shelf for smaller items there is plenty of space for keeping all the supplies needed for everyday gardening. The removable working surface even makes clean-up a breeze. Simply lift out the working surface and rinse with a garden hose. The Greenfield Potting Bench has overall dimensions of 48-Inch long, 19.5-Inch wide and 49-Inch high with work table dimensions of 43-Inch long, 16.5-Inch wide and 37-Inch high. Made with the highest quality PVC vinyl, this potting bench is completely maintenance free. The high quality PVC vinyl contains the highest concentration of titanium dioxide for the strongest UV sunlight protection. Buy with confidence, all Dura-Trel products are backed with a 20 year warranty guaranteeing your trellis will never delaminate, crack, peel, fade or discolor in any way. Once assembled and installed in your yard, the only maintenance ever needed is a simple spray with a garden hose and wipe clean.
feature_bullets: 20 Year Warranty; 100-percent maintenance free; PVC vinyl will not crack, fade, peel or discolor
Easy to Assemble; pre-cut and pre-drilled holes with all hardware included
Easy to Clean; simple spray with a garden hose and wipe clean
